task.title: Create a Custom Dashboard
task.shortdesc: View custom data specific to your needs.

context.p: When the default dashboards do not provide the data you need, create a custom data to obtain and report on the specific data you need.

step.cmd: Under the Custom panel, click Create Custom Dashboard.
step.stepresult: The Create Custom Dashboard page displays.

step.cmd: From the Attributes panel, click and drag the applicable attributes you want to use to build the custom dashboard to the dashboard creator.

taskbody.result: Your custom dashboard displays on the Dashboards page.
